        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1873</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Archaeological Sites in Israel — An Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archäologische Sites in Israel? Eine 
Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites archéologiques en Israel ? Une 
Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Locais archaeological em Israel? Uma 
Introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luoghi archaeological nell'Israele? 
Un'Introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαιολογικές περιοχές στο Ισραήλ; Μια εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Sitios arqueológicos en Israel? Una 
Introducción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource is an introduction to important archeological sites in Israel with information on each of them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">archeological sites</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel ist eine Einleitung zu den 
wichtigen archäologischen Sites in Israel mit Informationen über 
jede von ihnen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource est une introduction aux sites 
archéologiques importants en Israel avec l'information sur chacun 
d'eux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso é uma introdução aos locais 
archeological importantes em Israel com informação em cada um deles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa è un'introduzione ai luoghi 
archeological importanti nell'Israele con le informazioni su ciascuno 
di loro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς είναι μια εισαγωγή στις
σημαντικές archeological περιοχές στο Ισραήλ με τις πληροφορίες
για κάθε έναν από τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este recurso es una introducción a los sitios 
arqueológicos importantes en Israel con la información sobre cada 
uno de ellos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">archäologische Sites</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
